title: Looking for several low grade hall of famer
author: Bruinsfan94

posts.post_title: Looking for several low grade hall of famer
posts.post_content:
Looking to knock off a few t206 hall of famers. In particular these cards. I prefer SGC or PSA graded, but would consider raw or BVG. I'm mainly looking for lower grades: A to 2-2.5. I'm mainly looking for decent eye appeal.

Jack Chesbro
Walter Johnson ( Either one)
Cy Young ( Any variation)
Hugh Duffy
Zach Wheat
Eddie Collins
Bender ( Portrait)
Baker
Flick
Griffth ( Portrait)
Keeler ( Portrait)
Marqauird ( Portrait)
Wallace

I have some of these for sale


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

I buy them the same way you do and will not buy them off centered or rounded corners. I am very picky . Griffith PSA 3 and Wallace PSA2, looks like a solid PSA4, must be a problem somewhere. Both are eye appeal above avg.

225.oo they werent really for sale and I doubt look wise, I could not replace them w/o buying 4's no joke.

I still have this Bender portrait.  I could do a little better than list price.  Let me know.
